creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Elizabeth and Willard Clark
description: accordion album featuring black and white and some color landscapes; very worn blue and gold brocade cover
inscription:
Inscriptions, Marks, and Seals

various, inside
markings: page 4, in pencil: [Yamazoe Kakuken / 19th century Nanga artist--authentication notes by pupils Keido and Gido]; L edge of album, in brown ink: [Kakuken]; back cover, ULC, in ink: [Kakuken]; various seals inside
title: Miniature Album of Ten Paintings
